https //www youtube com/watch v=pefd5pxxsjq double_crochet single_crochet back loop only blo us terms devreser sthgir lla stfarccinapon 4202 © video tutorial measurements for the perfect fit we need to know your head circumference to measure it take a measuring tape and wrap it around the widest part of the head which is just above the ears and eyebrows in my case it is 57cm length fabric we are = about to crochet 30 cm width head circumference = cm devreser sthgir lla stfarccinapon 4202 © crocheting start with a slip knot make a 30cm long chain 52 stitches in my case row 1 chain 2 this provides the height for the stitches in the row 1dc in 3rd stitch from the hook mark this stitch to avoid missing the start of the row 1dc in each remaining st of the initial chain row 2 chain 2 turn your work 1dc blo in last st of the previous row mark this st 1dc blo in each remaining st of the previous row all following row are the same as row 2 so continue repeating row 2 until you reach the desired length head circumference note the fabric should be slightly stretched when measuring note 2 it s preferable to have an even number of row after completing the row do not cut the yarn not sure how to do it watch the video here - https //www youtube com/watch v=pefd5pxxsjq devreser sthgir lla stfarccinapon 4202 © 3 - 3 9 2 1 1 04 2-51 52 joining fold 2 sides of the fabric and seam them together using a slip_stitch seam as demonstrated in the video - link or any other seam method you prefer sew the first 7cm to form a cuff then flip your work inside out
